content:
Hi.
I am using ConceptMaps to define conversions from codingSystem A to another codingSystem B
While doing so, if my target concept is "narrower" than my source concept (i.e. more information would be needed for a successful mapping or 1 source concept maps to N target concepts), should my engine skip mapping the source to target concept?
Or should it map to all N target concepts?
@Kartik Sayani I think that actually depends on what you are wanting to achieve with your mappings. Maybe you could provide a more specific example we could look at?
